field.label: Publishable Key
field.tooltip: Please enter the Publishable Key which you will find in your Stripe Dashboard under the Developers > API keys > Standard Keys section.

field.label: Secret Key
field.tooltip: Please enter the Secret Key which you will find in your Stripe Dashboard under the Developers > API keys > Standard Keys section.
field.comment: You will need to replace the test keys with your live keys for production uses. Please check Stripe's documentation for more information on how to obtain your API keys.
